trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Configuration.MailSettingsSectionGroup" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.Configuration.MailSettingsSectionGroup" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This class corresponds to the [<mailSettings> Element (Network Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/mailsettings-element-network-settings.md) configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會對應到[ <mailSettings>項目 （網路設定）](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/mailsettings-element-network-settings.md)組態項目。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to access information about SMTP settings for the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別用來存取本機電腦的 SMTP 設定的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: This class provides programmatic access to information that can be stored in configuration files.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會提供以程式設計方式存取可以儲存在組態檔中的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Configuration.MailSettingsSectionGroup" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.Configuration.MailSettingsSectionGroup" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the SMTP settings for the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 取得本機電腦的 SMTP 設定。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.Configuration.SmtpSection" /> object that contains configuration information for the local computer.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Configuration.SmtpSection" /> 物件，包含本機電腦的組態資訊。

trans-unit.source: Mail settings affect the behavior of the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient> class.
